pr_title: Fix / suppress netty CVEs CVE-2019-20445 and CVE-2019-20444

timeline.message:
Suppress netty 3 vulnerabilites and upgrade netty 4 version

* Upgrade netty 4 version to fix vulnerabilities CVE-2019-20445
  and CVE-2019-20444
* suppress these CVEs for netty 3

Suppress netty 3 vulnerabilites and upgrade netty 4 version

* Upgrade netty 4 version to fix vulnerabilities CVE-2019-20445
  and CVE-2019-20444
* suppress these CVEs for netty 3

timeline.bodyText: The new CVEs can be added after line 149 instead to simplify the XML
timeline.author: ccaominh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -148,6 +148,22 @@
     <packageUrl regex="true">^pkg:maven/io\.netty/netty@.*$</packageUrl>
     <cve>CVE-2019-16869</cve>
   </suppress>
+  <suppress>
+    <!-- TODO: Fix by updating org.apache.druid.java.util.http.client.NettyHttpClient to use netty 4 -->
+    <notes><![CDATA[
+   file name: netty-3.10.6.Final.jar
+   ]]></notes>
+    <packageUrl regex="true">^pkg:maven/io\.netty/netty@.*$</packageUrl>
+    <cve>CVE-2019-20445</cve>

timeline.message:
* simplify suppression xml file
* update licenses file with new version of netty
